content.header: How To Make Page Cards In Your wiki's Home Page:
content.body:
To Make a Page Cards For your pages, It's pretty simple actually now that I think about it. anyways so you will have to open the file located here : Yourwiki/index.html

And inside the html file you should be able to find after you scroll for a bit This :

      <aside onclick="openPage('template.html?page=data/pages/pagestutorial.json')" class="pagecard short">
        <h2>Adding Pages</h2>
        <p>Shows how to add/Make pages into FrisWiki Through Code Editors or the page generator</p>
        <h4 style="color: grey;">JSON Release V1 ONLY!!!</h4>
      </aside>
    </div>

Now we are only interested in the aside element, to add a new page card you must add a <aside> element and add the .pagecard class to it while making sure it's the child of the cardcontainer div

optionally, you can also add .short or .wide for a shorter or wider card respectively

After that you can add a openPage('template.html?page=data/pages/yourpage.json') So it opens your page when it's clicked!

Now you can edit what you want to be in Pagecard, you can checkout the style.css sheet for styles if you want to use some classes or elements. Have fun!
